item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

the booleans and ints you’re editting only apply to your character and not everyone else’s.

item.title: How come pk wont turn off?
item.dc:creator: @XxGANGSTAxX XxGANGSTAxX
item.description:
@XxGANGSTAxX wrote:

This is the code i have in the client.java .

} if (command.startsWith("pkon") && playerRights >= 3) { IsAttacking = false; AttackingOn = 0; resetAnimation(); IsUsingSkill = false; } if (command.startsWith("pkoff") && playerRights >= 3) { IsAttacking = false; AttackingOn = 1; resetAnimation(); IsUsingSkill = true;

Is something wrong with the code? because nothing happens
